file_content.text: That's my girl.
Torian! You're okay! Stars, am I glad you're okay!
I--sorry... shouldn't have let this happen.
Sorry we're late.
Well... this is embarrassing.
I owe you. Again. My turn to be bait, I guess.
You able to move out?
Are you okay?
Definitely.
Bet they wish they hadn't caught me now.
Well, you got my attention.
Loser's bet.
Well, I always did find you attractive.
[Flirt] You make a good lure.
Hey now, get your own.
Whoa, okay. Save it for the ship, you two.
Lucky me.
Ahem. Unless you're planning to start a fire with those sparks, I vote we get out of here.
Maybe, but I was still the one getting shot at.
You got off lucky.
Never said I was good at it.
Got a bleeder.
This one ain't dead. Yet.
Hey, one of these creeps is still alive and kicking.
H--how? This should have been total overkill.
How many more of you are out there hunting me?
Was this everyone involved?
I don't know. I swear! Nobody does! We work independently. This is the first time I've heard of overseers acting in tandem.
Despite what you think, the Great Hunt's no joke.
You underestimated me.
There's a reason Mandalore made me his champion.
I'm used to having the odds stacked against me.
If this couldn't kill you, I don't know what would.
Buddy, I'll show you overkill.
All you did was tick me off.
It was just a job! The overseer says kill, I kill--you know how it is, I don't get a say.
I want out. I don't care how good the money is, it's not worth it.
Remember what you saw here today. Remind everyone why crossing me is a bad idea.
You can be a living deterrent.
I--I'll discourage them.
You're begging the wrong person.
That's up to my friend here.
Your call.
Torian. He's not worth it.
He went too far.
Due's paid.
It's too late for regrets.
You knew the risks. [Kill him]
Finished?
Grab your gear and get a move on.
Let's go.
You know, I was actually starting to miss you.
Welcome back.
Don't get used to me bailing you out.
I don't like doing favors.
Blizz, meet us back at the ship.
I've got things from here, Gault.
Just don't try calling me back once I get comfortable.
Killing's over. Wait for us back at the ship.
I'll find somethin' on the way.
Go on ahead. Keep an eye out for trouble.
Understood.
Mako, get back and pull together some data for our next target.
Got it. Be careful, you two.
Um, boss... um, boss. Boss!
Yes, boss!
